recipe_content: 1. In a glass, muddle fresh mint leaves and lime wedges. 2. Fill the glass with ice cubes. 3. Pour in white rum and simple syrup. 4. Top with club soda. 5. Stir gently and garnish with a mint sprig. Serve immediately.

1. Rub the rim of a glass with a lime wedge and dip it in salt. 2. Fill the glass with ice cubes. 3. In a shaker, combine tequila, triple sec, lime juice, and simple syrup. 4. Shake well and strain into the prepared glass. 5. Garnish with a lime wheel. Serve chilled.

1. In a blender, combine pineapple juice, coconut cream, white rum, and ice cubes. 2. Blend until smooth. 3. Pour into a glass. 4. Garnish with a pineapple wedge and a maraschino cherry. Serve chilled.

1. In a glass, muddle a sugar cube with a few dashes of Angostura bitters. 2. Add ice cubes. 3. Pour bourbon over the ice and stir well. 4. Garnish with an orange twist and a cherry. Serve on the rocks.
1. Fill a copper mug with ice cubes. 2. Add vodka and lime juice. 3. Top with ginger beer. 4. Stir gently. 5. Garnish with a lime wedge. Serve chilled.
1. In a shaker, combine white rum, lime juice, and simple syrup. 2. Fill with ice and shake well. 3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. 4. Garnish with a lime wheel. Serve immediately.

1. In a shaker, combine whiskey, lemon juice, and simple syrup. 2. Fill with ice and shake well. 3. Strain into a rocks glass filled with ice. 4. Garnish with a cherry and an orange slice. Serve immediately.

1. In a shaker, combine light rum, dark rum, lime juice, orange cura√ßao, and orgeat syrup. 2. Fill with ice and shake well. 3. Strain into a glass filled with ice. 4. Garnish with a mint sprig and a lime wheel. Serve immediately.
1. In a shaker, combine vodka, triple sec, cranberry juice, and lime juice. 2. Fill with ice and shake well. 3. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. 4. Garnish with a lime twist. Serve immediately.
1. In a glass, combine gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth. 2. Fill with ice and stir well. 3. Garnish with an orange twist. Serve on the rocks.
1. In a glass, muddle fresh mint leaves with simple syrup. 2. Fill the glass with crushed ice. 3. Add bourbon and stir well. 4. Garnish with a mint sprig. Serve immediately.

1. In a shaker, combine gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup. 2. Fill with ice and shake well. 3. Strain into a tall glass filled with ice. 4. Top with club soda. 5. Garnish with a lemon slice and a cherry. Serve immediately.
1. Fill a glass with ice cubes. 2. Add gin and top with tonic water. 3. Stir gently. 4. Garnish with a lime wedge. Serve immediately.

1. In a shaker, combine vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, hot sauce, salt, and pepper. 2. Fill with ice and shake well. 3. Strain into a glass filled with ice. 4. Garnish with a celery stalk and a lemon wedge. Serve immediately.
1. Fill a glass with ice cubes. 2. Add Aperol, Prosecco, and a splash of soda water. 3. Stir gently. 4. Garnish with an orange slice. Serve immediately.
